attributes.action: Prevent Ann Keen providing Free Health care to illegal immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this particular moment we have proposals from two Government Departments that are highly controversial, They want to give FREE health care to illegal immigrants who have made little or no financial contribution, while at the same time they considering imposing a Tax of £20.000 for long term health care on Pensioners, almost all of whom have paid National Insurance contributions all their working life.
